front.title: RSVP Extensions for Explicit Rate Congestion Control in Multiprotocol Label Switched (MPLS) Networks

abstract.t: This memo presents a set of extensions for supporting explicit ratecongestion control using RSVP. It should be perceived as an extensionto the RSVP functional specifications [RFC2205] These extensions include the standard format of the ER_SPEC object,and a description of RSVP's handling of the ER_SPEC object. This document does not advocate a particular distributed explicitrate congestion control algorithm.
